Assistant Section Officer (ASO)

Staff Selection Commission (SSC) — Central Secretariat

General administration, noting/drafting; selection via Tier-I & Tier-II CBT and document verification.

Departments Eligibility
120+

Active Vacancies

30+

Departments

₹45k–₹1.7L

Monthly Pay Range

All India

Service Locations

Public Service Careers

Opportunities span administration, engineering, health, education, finance, law enforcement, railways, and more. Roles are merit-based with reservations as per government norms.

Apply online, track status, receive admit cards, and get notified about results—all from one place.

Ensure you meet age limits, qualification criteria, and submit required documents before the deadline.

Transparent Recruitment

Centralised portal for safe, reliable applications and communications.

Departments & Sectors

Explore open posts across key ministries and PSUs.

Administrative Services

Secretariat, district offices, clerical & officer posts.

Railways & Transport

Operations, engineering, safety, accounts.

Police & Home

Constable to sub-inspector, cyber & comms.

Health & Education

Nurses, lab techs, teachers, lecturers.

Eligibility & Age

General criteria—refer to specific notification for exact rules.

Educational Qualification

10th/12th/ITI/Diploma/Graduate/Postgraduate depending on post; discipline-specific for technical roles.

Age Limits & Relaxations

Typical 18–27/30/32 years; relaxations for SC/ST/OBC-NCL/EWS/PwD/Ex-servicemen as per rules.

Domicile & Centres

All-India or state domicile; select up to three preferred exam centres.

Documents

Photo, signature, ID proof, education certificates, caste/EWS/PwD certificates (if applicable) in prescribed formats.

Application Process

Track your progress from application to appointment.

Step 1

Online Application

Register, fill details, upload documents, and submit.

Step 2

Admit Card & Examination

Download admit card; appear for CBT/OMR/descriptive as applicable.

Step 3

Skill/Physical/Interview

Role-specific tests, document verification.

Step 4

Final Merit & Appointment

Merit list publication and joining formalities.

Ready to Apply?

Submit your application now—complete it in a few steps.
